summary: Clean implementation of POST /pages/ endpoint that follows existing Plane API patterns. The code is well-structured with proper authentication, permission handling, and webhook activity tracking. A few minor observations but nothing blocking.

issues.description: Unused imports: Q, Value, and Coalesce are imported but never used in the file
issues.suggestion: Remove unused imports: Q, Value, and Coalesce from django.db.models

issues.description: Project model is imported but not used in the view file (the Project.objects.get call could use a different approach)
issues.suggestion: Consider using self.kwargs to validate project existence since the permission class already handles project validation

issues.description: Documentation file was created when it was not explicitly requested. The file also contains hardcoded test URLs (plane.mush.so, workspace slug 'oqva', specific project ID) which may not be relevant for other developers.
issues.suggestion: Consider removing IMPLEMENTATION_SUMMARY.md or making it part of official documentation if needed

positives: Follows existing Plane API patterns consistently (similar to issues, modules, cycles endpoints)
Proper use of BaseAPIView and ProjectEntityPermission for authentication/authorization
Good separation of concerns with PageCreateSerializer for input validation and PageSerializer for responses
Webhook activity tracking is properly integrated via model_activity.delay()
Validation that pages are enabled for the project before creation
Proper handling of ProjectPage association and PageLabel bulk creation
Response serializer re-fetches the page with proper annotations for consistent response format
URL routing correctly specifies http_method_names for each endpoint
